## Field.onLocationChange() method

Notifies the field that it has changed locations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onLocationChange(_: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_ | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) | The location of this field's block's top-start corner in workspace coordinates. |

**Returns:**

void
